Uses of Class
entropy.configuration.ConfigurationGenerator

  • Packages that use ConfigurationGenerator 
    Package Description
    entropy.configuration  

    • Uses of ConfigurationGenerator in entropy.configuration

      Methods in entropy.configuration that return ConfigurationGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.addCluster(entropy.configuration.Node[] nodeModels, String[][] nodeNames, entropy.configuration.VirtualMachine[] vmModels, String[][][][] vmNames)
      add a cluster of Servers and VMs to the configuration.
      the nodes and VMs added to the Configuration are also put in getLastAddedNodes() and getLastAddedVMs()
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.addNodes(Collection<entropy.configuration.Node> nodes)
      add and select a collection of nodes
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.addNodes(int num, int cpuCapa, int memSize)
      add online servers to the target
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.addNodes(int num, int coreCapa, int cpunum, int memSize)
      add online nodes to the target
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.addRunnings(int num, int cpuUsage, int memSize)
      add a given number of running VMs on last added nodes.
      short for addVMs(int, int, int, boolean) with last to true;
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.addVMs(int num, int cpuUsage, int memSize, boolean running)
      add VMs on last added nodes.
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.addWaitings(int num, int cpuUsage, int memSize) 
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.distributeVMs(Collection<entropy.configuration.VirtualMachine> vms)
      allocates a collection of VMs on the last added nodes in round-robin.
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.resetNodeIdx()
      reset the internal node index, used to name the Nodes using nodePrefix and nodeIdxConverter
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.resetVMIdx()
      reset the internal vm index, used to name the VMs using vmPrefix and vmIdxConverter
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.selectNodes(Collection<entropy.configuration.Node> nodes) 
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.selectVMs(Collection<entropy.configuration.VirtualMachine> vms) 
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.setNodeConverter(ConfigurationGenerator.IdxConverter converter) 
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.setNodePrefix(String nodePrefix) 
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.setVMConverter(ConfigurationGenerator.IdxConverter converter) 
      ConfigurationGenerator ConfigurationGenerator.setVmPrefix(String vmPrefix)
